wikipedia_page.main: Forrester Cockburn   (born 13 October 1934) is a British Paediatrician and emeritus professor at the University of Glasgow. Cockburn is most notable for conducting research into fetal/neonatal nutrition and brain biochemistry, inherited metabolic diseases and Pediatric ethics. Cockburn was awarded the prestigious James Spence Medal in 1998.

response: * Professor Forrester Cockburn, Samson Gemmell Professor of Child Health, University of Glasgow. For services to Medicine.
